attributes.action: stop the psychological currency - get ego-free physics value system and in view of that implement technical programs to secure inintellectual property
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Laws of economics break when there is a requirement for the (with
Informatics) potentially (and with respect to market efficiency, widespread
education and general preferences for equality) infinite supply of
patterns partaking of intellectual property (having expression rather
than being some internalised hallucination) which need to be
made available generally for general benefit to have justification -
trade secrets and conspiracies to protect such for power not being held
to bring beneficial progress, so to be made available. Those thus broken laws of economics are purely psychological:- egos, commands, wagers, loyalty - all these are elements of human society having no link to to the patterns objective of physics rather than subjectivities of individuals. The breach of psychological economics by the efficiency demands of IP in conjunction with IT require a physical paradigm of value. Time and energy being suggested as potentially those measurable quantities which may realistically have a macroscopic reality.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
